description: This file defines a helper class 'NoteMapper' that facilitates conversion between raw database row maps and 'Note' instances, using canonical column names. It handles both serialization and deserialization of Note objects for database operations.

classes.name: NoteMapper
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to map between database rows and Note objects.

methods.name: fromDb
methods.description: Converts a database row map to a Note instance by re-mapping canonical column names and parsing color values.

methods.name: toDb
methods.description: Converts a Note object into a map suitable for database insertion/updating with canonical column names.
